title: User Prefers Light Color Scheme
description: In this lab, we will explore and practice using JavaScript to create dynamic web pages. We will learn how to manipulate the Document Object Model (DOM) to add, remove, and modify HTML elements and content on a web page. Additionally, we will utilize event listeners to respond to user actions and create interactive experiences.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
